original_text: The inhabitants of the villages ceased, they ceased in Israel, until that I Deborah arose, that I arose a mother in Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘에는 마을 사람들이 그쳤으니 나 드보라가 일어나 이스라엘의 어머니가 되기까지 그쳤도다

sentences.original_text: The inhabitants of the villages ceased
that I arose a mother in Israel
